title: GENERAL DEFINITIONS
sample_text:
Words stated in the table below have a special meaning throughout this Policy, Policy Schedule / Certificate of

Word /s
Specific meaning
Accident
means sudden, unforeseen and involuntary event, caused by external, visible 
and violent means.
Service Provider
refers to an organization, or company  which shall provide assistance services 
under certain covers in this Policy.
Certificate of Insurance

Insured Person confirming the Insured Person’s coverage under the Policy and 
setting out the Ins

title: SECTION 1: LOST WALLET COVERAGE
sample_text:
Definition specific to this cover:
1.	
Replacement cost means the amount it would cost to replace an item by a new item of similar specifications.

title: 2.	 Personal Papers means Personal identification documents issued by Your country, state including Your driver’s
sample_text: license, passport, Pan Card and similar other document of like nature.

title: 3.	 Transportation ticket means the tickets purchased for bus, subway or other type of public or private
sample_text: transportation.

title: 4.	 Unauthorized charge means those charges which are incurred on the payment card after the physical loss of
sample_text:
the payment card and without the knowledge or consent of the payment card holder as per provisions, terms 
and conditions of payment card issuer.

title: 5.	 Cheque(s) means any Bank draft drawn against deposited funds to pay a specific sum to a specified payee
sample_text: on demand other than drafts with a stamped signature.

title: 6.	 Lost or Stolen means having been inadvertently lost or having been stolen by a third party without Your
sample_text:
assistance, consent or co-operation.
7.	
Payment card means an ATM card, credit card, prepaid card or debit card issued by a qualified financial 
institution for personal use only.
What We cover:
We will reimburse You for the following up to the Sum Insured as specified in the Certificate of Insurance when 
Your wallet is lost or stolen during the Policy period:
1.	
Replacement costs for the lost or stolen wallet.

title: 2.	 Cost to reinstate  Personal Papers including PAN Card, Passport, Driving License and/or Payment Cards. Further,
sample_text:
you can avail as part of the policy expenses to report lost card and to block card.*

3

The claim under this cover will be paid once during the Policy period. Sum Insured specified in the Certificate of

Specific Exclusions applicable to this Cover:
We shall not be liable to make any payment for any claim under this cover, directly or indirectly, caused by, based 
upon, arising out of, or in any way attributable to any of the following:
1.	
Transportation tickets, or other similar items that were

title: 2.	 losses that are caused by any events other than lost or stolen, such as fire, water, normal wear and tear,
sample_text: manufacturing defects, vermin, insects, cleaning or repairs, or similar events;

title: 6.	 Any consequential loss
sample_text:
*You can avail support and guidance though our empanelled service provider for replacement of personal papers, 
reporting and blocking of payment cards upon your request. Your request will be considered as your consent and

title: SECTION 2: KEY REPLACEMENT COVER
sample_text:
Definition specific to this cover
1.	
Break-in means to enter someone’s property/vehicle illegally by actual physical force or violence of which 
there shall be visible marks made at the place of such entry, with the intent to steal or commit a violent act.

title: 3.	 Lost or Stolen means having been inadvertently lost or having been stolen by a third party without Your
sample_text: assistance, consent, connivance or co-operation.

title: 5.	 OEM means the Original Equipment Manufacturer, involved in the manufacture and production of the insured
sample_text:
product.
What We cover:
We will reimburse You for the following up to the Sum Insured as specified in Certificate of Insurance if the event 
specified occurs within the Policy period:
1.	
Key Replacement – We will reimburse You for the cost of replacing Your Residence and/or Your Vehicle keys 
which are lost or stolen. The covered cost includes the amount You paid to a locksmith to produce a new key 
or actual replacement by OEM’s.

title: 2.	 Break-in Protection – We will reimburse You for the cost of replacing Your locks and keys if there is a Break-in
sample_text: in Your Residence or Your Vehicle. The covered costs include the labour cost for replacing the lock.

title: 3.	 Lock Out Reimbursement – We will reimburse You for the cost charged by a locksmith if You are locked out
sample_text: of Your Residence or Your Vehicle due to the loss or theft of Your keys.

title: 4.	 Rental Car Reimbursement – We will cover the car rental cost for a reasonable amount for maximum one day
sample_text:
if Vehicle keys are lost or stolen and it will take more than 24 hours to replace Vehicle keys.
Sum Insured as specified in the Certificate of Insurance shall be a cumulative sum of all the above covers put together
The claim under this cover will be paid for maximum two events during the Policy period.
Specific Exclusions applicable to this Cover
We shall not be liable to make any payment for any claim under this cover, directly or indirectly, caused by, based 
upon, arising out of, or in any way attributable to any of the following

4

title: HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company Limited. IRDAI Reg. No.146 CIN: U66030MH2007PLC177117. Registered & Corporate Office: 6th Floor, Leela Business Park,
SECTION 3: JOURNEY PROTECTION
sample_text:
Definition specific to this Section
1.	
Baggage shall mean personal effects belonging to Insured and being carried by the Insured or his family 
members or his employees during a journey, excluding jewellery, valuables, wallet, money, physical/ digital 
cards, Personal identification documents any portal electronic/mechanical items including but not limited to cell 
phones, music players, laptops, handheld computing, camera of any type or any other sophisticated electronic 
equipment and any business samples.

title: 2.	 Insured’s Vehicle shall mean Vehicle owned or hired or borrowed by the Insured. However unauthorised/illegal
sample_text: procession of vehicle is not included for the benefit.

title: 3.	 Personal effects shall mean articles, which belong to the Insured and normally worn, used or carried about by
sample_text:
the Insured or his/her Family members or his/her employees 
We will provide protection to journey undertaken by you/your family by providing following covers:
3.1	 Baggage Cover: We will indemnify You to the extent of the intrinsic value of the accompanied baggage and 
personal effects of the Insured, against loss, destruction or damage by any accident occurring during the Policy 
Period up to the sum insured limit as specified in the policy schedule/certificate of insurance for a journey 
undertaken anywhere in India
	
Special condition:
	
The Sum insured will get reduced for any claim paid u

title: 2.	 Money, securities, Manuscripts, deeds, bonds, Bills of Exchange, Promissory Notes, Stocks or Share Certificates,
sample_text:
stamps and travel tickets or travelers’ cheques, business books or documents, weapons and explosives of all 
kinds

title: 4.	 Devices like Mobiles, Tabs and iPad whether or not part of baggage; however in case you lose Your device
sample_text:
such as Mobile/iPad/Tablet,  you can avail support for blocking Your SIM Card through our empanelled service 
provider. The cost of duplicate sim and device is not covered.

title: 5.	 Leakage, spilling or exuding of liquids, oils or material of a like nature of articles of dangerous or damaging
sample_text: nature.

title: 6.	 Theft of baggage or article
sample_text:
7.	
Articles of consumable and of perishable nature.

title: 12.	 Any loss or damage arising through delay, detention or confiscation by Customs or other governmental
sample_text: authorities.

title: 15.	 Damage caused whilst being worked upon, by any process of cleaning, dyeing or bleaching, restoring, repairing
sample_text:
or renovation or deterioration arising from wear and tear, ageing, discoloration, defect, rust, oxidation, warping, 
shrinkage, corrosion, erosion, metal fatigue, aridity, humidity, exposure to light or extremes of temperature, 
rodents, moth, vermin, insects or mildew or any other gradually operating cause.

title: CLAIM PROCEDURE
sample_text:
In case of an event occurring resulting in a claim under this policy, You and/or Your legal representatives shall,
• 
send an immediate notice to Us of the said event and the nature of the loss through fax/email/registered post 
within a period of seven days from the date of its occurrence. You may call on the number stated hereunder 
for this purpose:
	
Contact us- 022 6234 6234/022 6158 2020. Within a period of 7 days forward to Us all the relevant documents 
in evidence of the event and in support to the claim, unless otherwise agreed by Us; wherever, details pertaining 
to any incident whi

title: GENERAL EXCLUSIONS
sample_text:
This Policy does not cover:
1.	
Any consequential loss or loss, destruction or Damage caused by war, invasion, act of foreign enemy hostilities 
or war like operations (whether war be declared or not), civil war, mutiny, civil commotion assuming the 
proportions of or amounting to a popular rising, military rising, rebellion, revolution, insurrection, or military 
or usurped power or seizure, capture, arrests, restraints and detainments of all kings, princess and people of 
whatever nation, condition or quality what so ever.

title: 2.	 Any consequential loss or loss, destruction or Damage directly or indirectly caused to the property insured by
sample_text:
a) ionizing radiations or contamination by radioactivity from any nuclear fuel or from any nuclear waste from the 
combustion of nuclear fuel b) the radioactive, toxic, explosive or other hazardous properties of any explosive 
nuclear assembly or nuclear component thereof.

title: 3.	 Any consequential loss or loss, destruction or Damage caused to the insured property by pollution or
sample_text:
contamination excluding a) pollution or contamination which itself results from a peril hereby insured against. 
b) any peril hereby insured against which itself results from pollution or contamination.

title: 4.	 Loss of earnings, loss by delay, loss of market or other consequential or indirect loss or Damage of any kind
sample_text: or description whatsoever.

title: 5.	 Loss or Damage to Contents due to defective workmanship, material or design, latent defect, wear and tear,
sample_text:
depreciation, moth, vermin, termites, Fungi, insects or mildew, process of cleaning, dyeing or bleaching, restoring, 
repairing, retouching or renovation, inherent vice, warping or shrinkage, the action of light or atmospheric 
conditions, natural ageing or any other gradually operating cause.

title: 6.	 Loss or Damage due to manufacturing defects in Electrical, Mechanical and Electronic Items for which the
sample_text:
manufacturer is responsible.
7.	
Loss of or Damage to the Property Insured under this Policy falling under the terms of the maintenance 
agreement.

9

title: 11.	 Any loss or Damage to the insured property or to the general public and/ or legal liability arising out of immoral

title: GENERAL CONDITIONS
sample_text:
1.	
Reasonable Care: You shall take all ordinary and reasonable precautions for the safety of the property insured 
and maintain it in efficient condition. In event of any accident or breakdown the insured property shall not be 
left unattended without proper precautions being taken to prevent further damage or loss and the insured 
property be used before necessary repairs are effected any extension of the damage or any further damage 
to the insured property shall be entirely at the Your own risk.

title: 2.	 The construction, interpretation and meaning of the provisions of this Policy shall be determined in accordance
sample_text:
with Indian law. The section headings of this Policy are included for descriptive purposes only and do not form 
part of this Policy for the purpose of its construction or interpretation

title: 3.	 Notices: Every notice, communication or intimation required or contemplated under this Policy to be given by
HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company Limited
sample_text:
6th Floor, Leela Business Park,
	
Andheri- Kurla Road, Andheri East, 
	
Mumbai- 400059
	
Contact us- 022- 6158 2020/ 022- 6234 6234
	
Unless otherwise directed by Us in writing no such notice, communication or intimation shall be valid unless it 
contains full particulars of the policy, persons covered under the Policy and other details as may be necessary.

title: 4.	 If the claim be in any respect fraudulent, or if any false declaration be made or used in support thereof or if
sample_text:
any fraudulent means or devices are used by You or any one acting on your behalf to obtain any benefit under 
the policy or if the loss or damage be occasioned by the willful act, or with the connivance of the Insured, all 
benefits under this policy shall be forfeited.

title: 5.	 Renewal: We shall be under no obligation to renew the policy on expiry of the period for which premium has been
sample_text:
paid. We reserve the right to offer revised rates, terms and conditions at renewal based on claim experience 
and a fresh assessment of the risk. This policy may be renewed only by mutual consent and subject to payment 
in advance of the total premium at the rate in force at the time of renewal. Unless renewed as herein provided, 
this policy shall automatically terminate at the expiry of the period for which premium has already been paid.

title: 6.	 We while granting this Policy to You have relied on the representations made by You in the Proposal form,
HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company Limited. IRDAI Reg. No.146 CIN: U66030MH2007PLC177117. Registered & Corporate Office: 6th Floor, Leela Business Park,
sample_text:
Andheri-Kurla Road, Andheri (East), Mumbai – 400 059.. UIN: Personal Essentials Shield - IRDAN146RPMS0077V01202526.
the representations so made by the Insured in the Proposal form, forms the basis of this Policy and any 
misrepresentations or misdescriptions of such representations shall render the Policy void ab initio. Further, the 
Insured shall at the time of making the claim under this Policy be required to furnish to Us all the documents 
which support the aforementioned representations.
7.

title: THIS POLICY shall be voidable in the event of mis-representation, mis-description or nondisclosure of any
sample_text: material particular.

title: 8.	 Multiple policies involving Bank or other lending or financing entity - In case there is more than one insurance
sample_text:
policy issued to the customer/ policyholder covering the same risk, We will not apply contribution clause. 
Underinsurance will be applied, wherever applicable, on an overall basis taking into consideration the sum 
insured under all policies and comparing it with value at risk.

title: 9.	 Subrogation: The Insured and any claimant under this Policy shall at the expense of Company do or concur in
sample_text:
doing or permit to be done all such acts and things that may be necessary or reasonably required by Us for 
the purpose of enforcing any civil or criminal rights and remedies or obtaining relief or indemnity from other 
parties to which We shall be or would become entitled or subrogated upon company paying for or making 
good any loss or damage under this Policy whether such acts and things shall be or become necessary or 
required before or after the Insured’s indemnification by Us.

title: 11.	 Termination of Policy: The Policy terminates on the happening of any of following events whichever is earlier –
sample_text:
a.	 cancellation by the Insured or the Insurer or;
	
b.	 expiry of the Period of Insurance as per provisions mentioned under ‘Period of Insurance’ in the Policy

title: 12.	 Cancellation:
sample_text:
Cancellation by Insured:
	
The Insured can cancel the policy at any time during the policy term, by informing We. 
	
For long term policies (policy duration more than 1 year):
	
In case of No claim:  We shall refund proportionate premium for the unexpired policy period.
	
In case of claim:  No refund shall be made for the year in which claim is made.   We shall refund proportionate 
premium for the unexpired policy years.
	
For policy duration up to 1 year:
	
We shall refund proportion premium for rest of the policy period subject to no claim(s) made during the policy 
period. 
	
Cancellation

title: 13.	  Limitation
sample_text:
The Company is not liable for any liability under the claim unless a dispute or suit is filed before appropriate 
authority within 12 months from the repudiation of claim. 
	
The Insurer agrees that any action or proceeding against them for the recovery of any claim under or by virtue 
of this insurance shall not be barred if commenced within the time prescribed in accordance with applicable 
law.
